akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 102–367, title IV, § 403(a)(4), Sept. 7, 1992, 106 Stat. 1084

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1736. Repealed. Pub. L. 102–367, title IV, § 403(a)(4), Sept. 7, 1992, 106 Stat. 1084
Section, Pub. L. 97–300, title IV, § 456, as added Pub. L. 99–496, § 14(a), Oct. 16, 1986, 100 Stat. 1265, related to projects designed to serve populations with multiple barriers to employment.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective July 1, 1993, see section 701(a) of Pub. L. 102–367, formerly set out as an Effective Date of 1992 Amendment; Transition Provisions note under section 1501 of this title.
